column4: Can someone help me get my ipod touch working with ubuntu? I've tried numerous guides, but different problems arise that the guide doesn't cover. Somebody please help me, before I switch to Windows?

Those are the details. I have an ipod touch, I can't get it to work with Ubuntu. I have tried every guide I can find on google, nothing has worked. I would appreciate it if someone with experience in this would assist me.
jailbreak your ipod and use ssh
